login.welcome: Welcome to the Livementor front-end technical test
login.default: Please create an account or login

home.description: The test is simple, you just have to create a messaging system that will allow two people to communicate. Depending on the level of difficulty you will have to do more or less. We provide within this project the connection to the database. It is a firebase database, the identifiers are already filled in. The firebase module and vuexfire are already installed.

chat.noMessage: No message in this conversation yet
